query:
SELECT r.id, r.name, r.category, rc.name as category_name, rc.isActive as category_active
FROM recipes r
LEFT JOIN recipeCategories rc ON r.category = rc.id
WHERE r.name = 'Test Shrimp Recipe';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute SELECT r.id, r.name, r.category, rc.name as category_name, rc.isActive as category_active
FROM recipes r
LEFT JOIN recipeCategories rc ON r.category = rc.id
WHERE r.name = 'Test Shrimp Recipe';
